moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Remote Point-to-Point Tunneling Protocol
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module initiates a PPTP connection to a remote machine (VPN server). Once
        the tunnel is created we can use it to force the victim traffic to go through the
        server getting a man in the middle attack. Be sure to allow forwarding and
        masquerading on the VPN server (mitm).
author: Borja Merino <bmerinofe@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
